code: import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'./SearchResultItem.scss';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function SearchResultItem(_ref){let{movie}=_ref;let ratingClass='';if(movie.tmdbRating>=8){ratingClass='search-result-item__rating--high';}else if(movie.tmdbRating>=7){ratingClass='search-result-item__rating--medium';}else{ratingClass='search-result-item__rating--low';}const genresText=Array.isArray(movie.genres)?movie.genres.join(', '):movie.genres;const formatRuntime=runtime=>{const hours=Math.floor(runtime/60);const minutes=runtime%60;return"".concat(hours," \u0447 ").concat(minutes," \u043C\u0438\u043D");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/movie/".concat(movie.id),className:"search-result-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"search-result-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"search-result-item__image",src:movie.posterUrl,alt:movie.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"search-result-item__info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"search-result-item__top-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"search-result-item__rating ".concat(ratingClass),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"search-result-item__star-icon",src:"/icons/Vector.svg",width:"16",height:"16",alt:"\u0420\u0435\u0439\u0442\u0438\u043D\u0433"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:movie.tmdbRating})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"search-result-item__details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:movie.relaseYear}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:genresText}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:formatRuntime(movie.runtime)})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"search-result-item__title",children:movie.title})]})]})});}export default SearchResultItem;
